name: Aashi Dutt Gupta
bio: I offer a solid grounding in AI and machine learning techniques, complemented by recognition as a Kaggle Expert. My practical mastery of AI is further showcased by a publication on deep learning and a pending patent for an innovative smart monitoring solution. I am passionately driven to leverage these skills to effect significant industry impact and am eager to pursue opportunities as a Machine Learning Engineer where I can contribute to the real-world applications of AI.

name: Akash Shukla
community_title: Contributor-Beckn Protocol | Mentor-Google for Startups Accelerator (EU & Africa)
bio: Akash has been a part of global communities, startups, upskilling, and innovation initiatives. He has personally seen the impact of his programs on 300,000+ people across 18+ countries. Having worked with teams globally, he has seen the power of sustained, scaled efforts. He has specialized himself in running globally scalable, value-driven programs and envisions building an impactful career around this.

name: Ayushi Gupta
bio: I am a passionate and results-driven team lead for core development at Zalando, where I lead a team of developers who work on the core of the Zalando fashion app. With extensive experience in developing and maintaining software applications and services using modern software development practices, I am proficient in programming languages such as Kotlin, Java, Python, Node js, and JavaScript. I possess strong problem-solving and analytical skills, a good understanding of software architecture principles and patterns, and excellent communication and collaboration skills.

name: Pawan Kumar
community_title: Tech Lead, Google Developer Expert in Flutter & Firebase.
bio: As a seasoned Tech Lead with expertise in Large Language Models (LLMs) and mobile app development, I am passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technology to solve real-world problems. As a Google Developer Expert in Flutter & Firebase, I bring a wealth of knowledge and hands-on experience to every project, ensuring robust, scalable, and innovative solutions.

name: Vaibhav Pathak
bio: I'm a highly skilled and imaginative Product Designer with over 7 years of experience crafting beautiful and functional products. With expertise in user research, interaction design, and visual aesthetics, I excel at blending user-centricity, innovation, and visual excellence to deliver impactful designs.

name: Mohd Kafeel Khan
bio: Experienced DevOps Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry.Implementation of Continous Integration, Continous Development & Deployment with area of expertise in Mobile Applications.

name: Saurabh Rajpal
bio: Seasoned s/w professional with over a decade of diverse experience across people / project / program management, technical sales / product consulting and full stack software development. Established tech speaker and content writer for web, cloud, tensorflow.js, firebase, modern application development and business case studies!
